tgt_original: 阿惟越致菩薩摩訶薩若欲修四念處乃至修八聖道分，空、無相、無作三昧乃至五神通，即得修。

src_original: yāvat pañcābhijñā abhinirharati,  imaiś caturbhir dhyānaiś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhir nirodhasamāpattibhiś ca parijayaṃ karoti,  catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayati samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgam āryāṣṭāṅgikaṃ mārgaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate,
tgt_original: 是菩薩雖修四念處乃至五神通，是人不受四念處果；

src_original: na ca dhyānaphalaṃ parigṛhṇāti,  yāvan na nirodhasamāpattiphalaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
tgt_original: 雖修諸禪，不受諸禪果，乃至不受滅定禪果。

src_original: na srotaāpattiphalaṃ parigṛhṇāti na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvaṃ parigṛhṇāti
tgt_original: 不證須陀洹果，乃至不證辟支佛道。

src_original: na pratyekabodhiṃ parigṛhṇāti ākāṅkṣamāṇa evaṃ saṃcintyātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti yenātmabhāvena  sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti tam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir
tgt_original: 是菩薩故為眾生受身，隨其所應而利益之。 須菩提！

src_original: liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.  iti duḥkhe 'nvayajñānam
tgt_original: 以是行、類、相貌，當知是名阿惟越致菩薩摩訶薩。

src_original: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo manasikāreṇa samanvāgato bodhicittenāvirahito na rūpaguruko bhavati na kṣaṇaguruko bhavati nāsravaguruko bhavati,
tgt_original: 「復次，須菩提！ 阿惟越致菩薩摩訶薩常憶念阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，終不遠離薩婆若心。

src_original: na dānaguruko bhavati na śīlaguruko bhavati na kṣāntiguruko bhavati na vīryaguruko bhavati na dhyānaguruko bhavati na prajñāguruko bhavati,  nāpramāṇaguruko bhavati nārūpyaguruko bhavati na samāpattiguruko bhavati nābhijñāguruko  bhavati na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyadharmaguruko bhavati na sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattiguruko  bhavati na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaguruko bhavati nāryasatyaguruko bhavati na vaiśāradyaguruko
tgt_original: 不遠離薩婆若心故，不貴色、不貴相，不貴聲聞、辟支佛，不貴檀那波羅蜜、尸羅波羅蜜、羼提波羅蜜、毘梨耶波羅蜜、禪那波羅蜜、般若波羅蜜，不貴四禪、四無量心、四無色定，不貴五神通，不貴四念處乃至八聖道分，不貴佛十力乃至十八不共法，不貴淨佛國土，不貴成就眾生，不貴見佛，不貴種善根。 何以故？

src_original: bhavati na buddhadarśanaguruko bhavati na kuśalamūlāvaropanaguruko bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 不見可貴法、能生貴心者。 何以故？

src_original: tathā hi te sarvadharmā ākāśasamā abhāvasvabhāvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ. sa khalu punaḥ
tgt_original: 是一切法與虛空等，無所有、自相空。

src_original: na ca sthāsyati na niṣīdiṣyati na śayyāṃ kalpayiṣyati sa smṛta evāgamiṣyati gamiṣyati caṅkramiṣyati sthāsyati niṣīdiṣyati śayyāṃ kalpayiṣyati,
tgt_original: 是阿惟越致菩薩摩訶薩成就是心，於四種身威儀中，出入來去、坐臥行住，一心不亂。

src_original: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
tgt_original: 須菩提！ 以是行、類、相貌，當知是阿惟越致菩薩摩訶薩。

src_original: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'gāram adhyāvasann upāyakauśalyena sattvānāṃ paripācanāya pañcakāmaguṇān upadiśati sarvasattvānāṃ dānaṃ dadāti,  annam annārthikānāṃ,  pānaṃ pānārthikānāṃ yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyakān pariṣkārān dadāti,
tgt_original: 阿惟越致菩薩摩訶薩若在居家，以方便力為利益眾生故受五欲，布施眾生，須食與食、須飲與飲，衣服、臥具乃至資生所須，盡給與之。

src_original: sa ātmanā ca dānapāramitāyāṃ carati,  parāṃś ca dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati dānapāramitāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate,  ye cānye dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ,
tgt_original: 是菩薩自行檀那波羅蜜，教人行檀那，讚歎行檀那法，歡喜讚歎行檀那波羅蜜者；

src_original: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ,  sa ātmanā ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,  parāṃś ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati,  prajñāpāramitāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate,  ye cānye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. iti samudaye dharmajñānam
tgt_original: 尸羅波羅蜜乃至般若波羅蜜亦如是。

src_original: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'gāram adhyāvasan jambūdvīpaṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadāti,  evaṃ cāturdvīpakaṃ lokadhātuṃ sāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ dvisāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ yāvat trisāhasraṃ mahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadāti,
tgt_original: 須菩提！ 阿惟越致菩薩摩訶薩在家時，能以滿閻浮提珍寶施與眾生，乃至三千大千世界滿中珍寶給施眾生。

src_original: na ca kāmaguṇān paribhuṅkte satatasamitaṃ brahmacārī bhavati,  na ca kasyacid avamardanākāraṃ janayati yenāvamardanākāreṇa paro 'nāttamanāḥ syāt,
tgt_original: 亦不自為常修梵行，不陵易虜掠他人令其憂惱。

src_original: ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
tgt_original: 須菩提！ 以是行、類、相貌，當知是名阿惟越致菩薩摩訶薩。

src_original: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satatasamitaṃ vajrapānir yakṣaḥ sadānubaddho bhaviṣyaty,  yathā mamānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satatasamitaṃ samanubaddho yāvat pañcavajrapāṇi kulāni satatasamitaṃ samanubaddhāni bhaviṣyanti,
tgt_original: 「復次，須菩提！ 阿惟越致菩薩摩訶薩，執金剛神王常隨逐，作是願： 『是菩薩摩訶薩當得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，我常隨逐，乃至五性執金剛神常隨守護。

src_original: tathā hi sarvadharmatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasyānunayaṃ vā pratighaṃ vā samanupaśyati. na grāmakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya  tathā hi sarvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasya nicayaṃ vāsaṃnicayaṃ vā samanupaśyati. na nagarakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya  tathā hi sa ākāśaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasya saṃgrahaṃ vāsaṃgrahaṃ vā samanupaśyati. na nigamakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 諸法自相空故，不見法若合若散。 不好說城邑事。 何以故？ 住諸法實際中，不見有勝有負。 不好說國事。

src_original: tathā hi subhūte koṭyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasyātyayaṃ vānatyayaṃ vā samanupaśyati. nātmakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
tgt_original: 何以故？ 住實際中，不見法有所屬有不屬。

src_original: evaṃ na sattvajīvajantupoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?  atyantaviśuddhatvāt sarvadharmāṇām anyatra prajñāpāramitākathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
tgt_original: 不好說我事。 何以故？ 法性中住，不見法有我無我，乃至不見知者、見者。

src_original: avirahitaś ca sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ. iti nirodhe 'nvayajñānam  sa dānapāramitāyāṃ caran na mātsaryakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
tgt_original: 如是等不說種種世間事，但好說般若波羅蜜不遠離薩婆若心，若行檀那波羅蜜時，不為慳貪事。

src_original: śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran na dauḥśīlyakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,  kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran na pratighakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,  vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran na kauśīdyakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
tgt_original: 行尸羅波羅蜜時，不為破戒事。 行羼提波羅蜜時，不為瞋諍事。

src_original: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran na vikṣepakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,  prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dauṣprajñākathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
tgt_original: 行毘梨耶波羅蜜時，不為懈怠事。 行禪那波羅蜜時，不為散亂事。 行般若波羅蜜時，不為愚癡事。

src_original: sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ viharan dharmakāmaś caiva bhavati nādharmakāmaḥ,
tgt_original: 是菩薩雖行一切法空，而愛樂法。

src_original: sa tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ākāṅkṣati,
tgt_original: 是人常願欲見諸佛、聞在所處。

src_original: darśanāya yatra lokadhātau tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,  ākāṅkṣaṃs tatropapadyate,
tgt_original: 佛國土中有現在佛，隨願往生。

src_original: sa imair manasikārair rātriṃdivaṃ viharati yad uta buddhamanasikāraiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 如是心常晝夜行，所謂念佛心。

src_original: manasikārān utpādayitvā daśabhiḥ kuśalaiḥ karmapathair vartamānāḥ teṣu buddhakṣetreṣūpapadyante,  yatra saṃmukhībhūtās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti.  tatra prathamaṃ dhyānam utpādayitvā yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattim utpādayitvā tatropapadyante,  yatra saṃmukhībhūtās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
tgt_original: 阿惟越致菩薩摩訶薩行初禪乃至非有想非無想處，以方便力故，起欲界心，若眾生能行十善道者及現在有佛處，在中生。

src_original: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ. iti mārge dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
tgt_original: 以是行、類、相貌，當知是名阿惟越致菩薩摩訶薩。

src_original: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
tgt_original: 「復次，須菩提！

src_original: carato 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitasya yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitasya smṛtyupasthāne  sthitasya samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgeṣu sthitasyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu  sthitasyāryasatyeṣu sthitasya śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukheṣu sthitasya sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukheṣu
tgt_original: 阿惟越致菩薩摩訶薩行般若波羅蜜時，住內空、外空乃至無法有法空，住四念處乃至空、無相、無作解脫門，於自地中了了，不疑我是阿惟越致、非阿惟越致。

src_original: avinivartanīyo vāhaṃ na vāham avinivartanīya iti vicikitsā cāsya notpadyate. niḥsaṃśayaś ca bhavati svakāyāṃ bhūmau. tat kasya hetoḥ?  tathā hi so 'ṇum api dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati,
tgt_original: 乃至不見少許法於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提中若轉若不轉。

src_original: yo vivartate vā na vā vivartate. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte srotaāpannaḥ srotaāpattiphalabhūmau  sthito buddhabhūmau sthito na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsaty,
tgt_original: 須菩提！ 譬如人得須陀洹果、住須陀洹地中，自了了知，終不疑不悔。 阿惟越致菩薩摩訶薩亦如是，住阿惟越致地中終不疑。

src_original: sa tatrāvinivartanīyabhūmau sthito buddhakṣetrañ ca pariśodhayati,  sattvāṃś ca paripācayaty,
tgt_original: 住是地中，淨佛國土、成就眾生。

src_original: utpannotpannāni ca mārakarmāṇi budhyate,  na ca mārakarmāṇāṃ vaśena gacchati,
tgt_original: 種種魔事起即時覺知，亦不隨魔事、破壞魔事。

src_original: nāma subhūte puruṣa ānantaryakarmakārī ānantaryacittenāvirahito yāvan maraṇakālam  ity anuvartata eva tad ānantaryacittaṃ,  na ca tatrānantaryacittaṃ śaknoti viṣkambhayitum,
tgt_original: 譬如有人作五逆罪，五逆罪心乃至死時常逐不捨，雖有異心不能障隔。

src_original: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tad avinivartanīyacittaṃ bhūtaṃ sthitam avinivartanīyabhūmāv  avikampan tac cittaṃ,
tgt_original: 阿惟越致菩薩摩訶薩亦如是，自住其地、心常不動。

src_original: na śakyate sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena vivartayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 一切世間天、人、阿修羅不能動轉。 何以故？

src_original: tathā hi tad avinivartanīyacittaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuram atikramya samyaktvaniyāmam avakrāntaṃ sa svakāyāṃ bhūmau sthitvābhijñāparamapāramitāḥ prāpya buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,  sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
tgt_original: 是菩薩摩訶薩出一切世間天、人、阿修羅上，入正法位中，自證地中住，具足諸菩薩神通，能淨佛國土、成就眾生。

src_original: buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati,  teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu kuśalamūlāny avaropayitvā tāṃś ca buddhān bhagavataḥ paripṛcchati paripraśnayati paryupāste.
tgt_original: 從一佛國至一佛國，於十方佛所殖諸善根，親近諮問諸佛。

src_original: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tathā sthitaḥ,  sa māna utpannotpannāni ca mārakarmāṇy avabudhyate,  utpannotpannānāñ ca mārakarmāṇāṃ vaśena na gacchati,  tāni ca mārakarmāṇy upāyakauśalyena bhūtakoṭīḥ śodhayati,
tgt_original: 是菩薩如是住，種種魔事起覺而不隨，以方便力處魔事著實際中。 自證地中不疑不悔。

src_original: svakāyāñ ca bhūmau na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: tathā hi sa niḥkāṅkṣo bhūtakoṭyāḥ,
tgt_original: 實際中無疑相故。

src_original: na bhūtakoṭim ekāṃ vā dve vā vikalpayati,  tasya jātivinivṛttasyāpi na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau cittam utpadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 知是實際非一非二，以是因緣故，是人乃至轉身，終不向聲聞、辟支佛地。

src_original: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu na kasyacid dharmasyotpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā saṃkleśaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā samanupaśyati. iti mārge dharmajñānam
tgt_original: 是菩薩摩訶薩諸法自相空中，不見法若生若滅、若垢若淨。

src_original: jātivinivṛttasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati,  nāhaṃ nābhisaṃbhotsye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim,  abhisaṃbhotsya evāham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 是菩薩摩訶薩乃至轉身，亦不疑我當得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提、若不得。 何以故？

src_original: tathā hi subhūte svalakṣaṇaśūnyā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.  sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sthitaḥ svakāyāṃ bhūmāv,
tgt_original: 須菩提！ 諸法自相空即是阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。 須菩提！

src_original: aparapratyayaḥ svakāyāṃ bhūmāv,  anavamardanīyaḥ svakāyāṃ bhūmau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 是菩薩摩訶薩住自證地中，不隨他語，無能壞者。 何以故？

src_original: tathā hi subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sthito 'saṃhāryeṇa jñānena samanvāgato bhavati.
tgt_original: 是阿惟越致菩薩摩訶薩成就不動智慧故。 須菩提！ 以是行、類、相貌，當知是名阿惟越致菩薩摩訶薩。

src_original: sacet khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
tgt_original: 「復次，須菩提！ 菩薩摩訶薩，若惡魔作佛身來，語菩薩言：
